modName: Fully Functional Upper Class Furniture Resources
summary:
- This modders resources give you the ability to open all Drawers and Doors
- This modders resources is made using NifSkope,ChunkMerge and vanilla meshes
- This modders resources only included glassdoor textures and modified vanilla meshes
- Not included other textures because come from main game
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone i hope you found it useful this modders resources for your mods
Feel free to add screenshots
If you like this resources please endorse

====================================================================================================================

About modders resources :

- This modders resources give you the ability to open all Drawers and Doors.
- This modders resources is made using NifSkope,ChunkMerge and vanilla meshes.
- This modders resources only included glassdoor textures and modified vanilla meshes.
- Not included other textures because come from main game.

====================================================================================================================

Change log :

- Version 1.1 
  - add "UpperClassWardrobeWithoutDoorHingeO1_Static" for people who be like to combinate with other modders resources

- Version 1.2 
  - Reupload of Version 1.1

- Version 1.3
  - Fixed Collision in all models
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardGlassDoors01_Container
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardGlassDoors01_Door
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardLeftGlassDoor01_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardLeftGlassDoor01_Door 
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardOrWardrobeShelf01_Static 
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardRightGlassDoor01_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardRightGlassDoor01_Door 
  - Add: UpperClassCupboardWithDoorHinge01_Static 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeDoors02_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeDoors02_Door 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeLeftDoor01_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeLeftDoor02_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeLeftDoor02_Door 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeRightDoor01_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeRightDoor02_Container 
  - Add: UpperClassWardrobeRightDoor02_Door

- Version 1.4
 - Fixed Collision in all static models
 - Add versions with out horns from side and top
  - Add UpperClassCupboard02_Static
  - Add UpperClassCupboardWithDoorHinge02_Static
  - Add UpperClassDresser02_Static
  - Add UpperClassEndTable02_Static
  - Add UpperClassWardrobe02_Static 
  - Add UpperClassWardrobeWithoutDoorHinge02_Static

- Version 1.5
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinet01_Static
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinet02_Static
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinetGlassDoors01_Container
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinetGlassDoors01_Door
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinetLeftGlassDoor01_Container
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinetLeftGlassDoor01_Door
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinetRightGlassDoor01_Container
  - Add UpperClassShelfCabinetRightGlassDoor01_Door

- Version 1.6
  - Add UpperClassDesk01_Static
  - Add UpperClassDeskLeftLowerDrawer01_Container
  - Add UpperClassDeskLeftTopDrawer01_Container
  - Add UpperClassDeskRightLowerDrawer01_Container
  - Add UpperClassDeskRightTopDrawer01_Container

- Version 1.7
  - Add UpperClassBookShelf01_Static
  - Add UpperClassBookShelf02_Static
  - Add UpperClassBookShelfGlassDoors01_Door

- Version 1.8
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboard01
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardDoors01_Container
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardDoors02_Container
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardDoors02_Door

  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardGlassDoors02_Door
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardGlassLeftDoor01_Container

  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardGlassLeftDoor02_Door
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardGlassRightDoor01_Container
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardGlassRightDoor02_Container
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardGlassRightDoor02_Door
  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardLeftDoor01_Container

  - Add UpperClassSmallCupboardRightDoor02_Door

- Version 1.9
   - Fixed UV in all Drawers

====================================================================================================================

Permission :

- You can use for free without asking for permission in your mods as long you credit me as author of this modders resources.
- For modify and other things see permission tab.
